meanings.definition: The act of editing or revising a previously published work.
meanings.sent1: The reedition of the book involved fixing typos and adding new illustrations.
meanings.sent2: I bought the reedition of my favorite novel with a new cover design.
meanings.sent3: The reedition of the cookbook made the recipes easier to follow.
meanings.sent4: Her reedition of the essay shed new light on the author's intentions.
meanings.sent5: The reedition of the magazine included bonus content for readers.

meanings.definition: A new edition of a previously published book or other work.
meanings.sent1: The reedition of the dictionary had updated definitions and examples.
meanings.sent2: The reedition of the textbook had a more colorful layout to engage students.
meanings.sent3: The reedition of the play had a surprise ending that shocked the audience.
meanings.sent4: His reedition of the map included new landmarks and routes.
meanings.sent5: The reedition of the album featured remastered tracks for better sound quality.
